title: HoP 396 - Lorraine Daston on Renaissance Science
itunes:title: HoP 396 - Lorraine Daston on Renaissance Science
description: Comets! Magnets! Armadillos! In this wide-ranging interview Lorraine Daston tells us how Renaissance and early modern scientists dealt with the extraordinary events they called "wonders".
